reviews.review: Simple, pero complejo a la vez; además de directo y divertido. De los mejores juegos de la última década. Algo corto, pero Portal 2 solventa esto. Muy recomendable. Obra maestra.
This was a triumph.

I've always wondered what all the fuss was about for this game and now having played it i finally understand. I came in with low expectations (despite all the praise) since i'm not a huge fan of puzzle games but it's safe to say i thoroughly enjoyed the gameplay. What really made this game amazing for me was the AI computer which is present in the game and just how humorous the game was. Even the credits are funny!!!. This is definitely one of my favourite games and i can't wait to play the second one.

Timeless classic. A short, fun puzzle game with a wonderful storyline attached. Some of the challenges are kind of broken due to the physics engine and it's not puzzle-based so much as it is repetition. Not a fan, but it's not a detriment to the game

Un juego totalmente increible, tiene sus años, no se le notan, Valve siempre crea juegazos.

Aun que me mareó muchisimo jajaja es fantastico el juego. Lo compre hace unos 2 días y ya lo terminé

Recomendadisimo si tu pc no es tan pc gamer y quieres un juego de puzzles con una historia super genial.

Its over 9000/10 No puedo esperar a comprar el 2
Es un buen juegos, te entretiene mucho, es ideal si eres alguien al que le gustan los puzzles, buena trama.
Сюжетная часть очень понравилась, но усложненные карты придумал больной ублюдок

Gran juego. Corto esta bien si,pero te abre una nueva experiencia de juegos de puzzles que por lo menos yo nunca había probado,muy buen juego directo te hace pensar si algo así podría pasar en la vida real por lo menos a mi me encanta.

Why didn't I play this sooner, I wonder? I remember watching a friend play, some 6 years ago or so. I also remember getting the demo on my Steam account, though my PC at the time was useless and after a while I just forgot about gaming on it in general. Well, now with the holidays sales, this was just the perfect opportunity to finally get Portal and Portal 2, and I definitely don't regret.

This first game is fairly short—I'd say 4 hours on the first playthrough, if one's not too coordination-challenged—but it doesn't make it less interesting: advanced maps as well as additional achievements become available once you've completed it once, so there's a replayability factor here. That, and GLaDOS's antics and taunts, which I always find pretty funny. And the Companion Weighted Cube. Yes, I find this adorable. Even the turrest are somewhat cute. Don't ask.

Anyway—I had lots of fun with Portal, will play it again for sure, and clearly recommend it.
Amazing Game but too short.
Its a really ammusing game.Good song at the end BTW.Great job Valve.I love you <3
GlaDOS is such a nice 'person', you should NEVER attack her. . . ever.
why dont you have this game?

"Now you are thinking with portals" creo que es la frase que mejor le define. Probablemente el videojuego que más rompió mis esquemas cuando lo jugué. Obliga a cambiar totalmente tu percepción de la "realidad". Cuando empiezas a usar los portales tu mente ya piensa distinto. Además, me parece que tiene una curva de aprendizaje perfecta, para que incluso si no te gustan los puzles o no has jugado a un FPS nunca, puedas hacerlo. Lo único malo, que se me hizo corto.

Resumiendo, maravilloso y de los mejores juegos a los que he jugado nunca.
Luxusní hra :D Prostě Klasika :D

This game is a classic that I'd recommend to everyone. 

I have played it several times and will probably do it again in the future, just because it's fun to open portals everywhere :D
정말 재밌네요.

[h1]Portal[/h1]

[u]Pontos Positivos[/u]

+ História básica, mas com um final ótimo que abriu portas para uma história bem mais profunda.
+ Puzzles difíceis, especialmente as ultimas câmaras.
+ Ambientes interessantes, e por vezes sombrios.
+ Boa trilha sonora.

[u]Pontos Negativos[/u]

- Curta duração (em torno de 2 horas.)
- Fator replay muito fraco

[h1]Portal recebe a nota 8/10[/h1]

Portal é um ótimo jogo sem dúvidas. Apenas não espere muito dele caso você ja tenha jogado Portal 2 que é muito mais complexo. Portal continua sendo um ótimo jogo apesar de se esconder na sombra do seu sucessor, e eu digo que vale a pena comprá-lo.

[b]Diga se a review foi útil ou não, e se não foi, comente por que. Eu Agradeço.[/b]

已经四刷了 游戏定位很明确，设计了一个未来的背景 人工智能与改造人(你)交流很频繁 甚至不少地方开一些你完全听不懂的玩笑(感觉字幕翻译有点问题 ) 。非常凄凉的游戏 全程的BGM除了跳跃和飞行时有一些轻微欢快的感觉 其他都是很静的BGM或是没有 再加上颤抖的AI电子音  第一遍我是忍着鸡皮疙瘩玩完的  尤其是 通关后那段Cake Room 一堆核心盯着你很发毛 但是最后的那首歌《Still Alive》真是一把抚平了所有的鸡皮疙瘩！
Годная классика
портал одна из самых классических компьютерных игр, способная заинтереовать практически любого человека. изумительный юмор, интересные квесты и делают эту игру одной из лучших в своём жанре

시공의 폭풍속으로!!

传送门这款游戏，好吧，太TM有创意了。个人对这个游戏的定义是“第一人称射击类解谜游戏”。（没想到居然还有这种类型的游戏，也是长见识了...）通关时间大约4小时，谜题因为有一步一步的引导所以并没有感觉特别困难，感觉制作组真的很用心，特别是通关之后可以看设计组关于关卡的设计思路和各种创意点真的是诚意满满。官方的中文翻译也给好评，还有就是买游戏送原生音乐，直接到DLC页面选择下载就行，片尾曲是大家的心头好就不再赘述了。
缺点就是玩这游戏容易晕3D，所以通关之后有没有再玩了，如果没有这个困扰我可能会尝试全成就。
个人评价是一款比较推荐的小游戏，适合作为大作后的甜品食用。

Einfach ein klasse Spiel, das nicht umsonst so erfolgreich geworden ist. Tolle Einführung in das Spiel, gute und knifflige Rätsel, die sehr viel Freude bereiten. Das Spiel ist nur durch Teil 2 zu überbieten, dennoch ist es unverzichtbar, vorher diesen Teil gespielt zu haben. Beide Daumen hoch für Portal und Valve.

While I'm not typically a fan of puzzle games (because I suck at them), I'd heard so much about the Portal games over the years that I thought I'd give this one a shot. Towards the end I resigned myself to using youtube videos to help on a fair few of the levels, but that's purely because I was invested in the narrative of the game which is something I'm sure most puzzle games don't have going for them. Great use of dark humour and definitely will be giving Portal 2 a try.
